title: feat: merge Docs page into Play page Integrate section
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: The standalone Docs page has been merged directly into the Play page, creating a unified hub for creation and integration.
gist.impact: Developers can now instantly view and copy live, color-coded API URLs for their current model settings without leaving the playground.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee bridging the gap between creativity and code. A retro game console (representing 'Play') physically connected to a glowing data terminal (representing 'Docs/Integration'). The bee is happily managing the connection.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee connecting a retro game controller to a glowing holographic code terminal. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Represents merging play and documentation. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
